supportDesc.support: Fragments 1-16 (in mm), (1) 36 x 41, (A) 2 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (2) 51 x 34, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) 4 lines, no margins, (3) 56 x 25, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (4) 56 x 30, (A) 5 lines, left margin, (B) traces, (5) 62 x 52, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (6) 57 x 90, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) 1 line, (7) 34 x 13, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (8) 14 x 21, (A) 1 line, no margin, (B) blank, (9) 33 x 26, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (10) 30 x 88, (A) 4 lines, right margin (?), (B) blank, (11) 60 x 39, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (12) 42 x 41, (A) 4 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (13) 90 x 35, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (14) 53 x 34, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) 2 lines, no (?) margins, (15) 40 x 8, (A) 1 line, no margins, (B) blank, (16) 85 x 64, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank
